channel.title: Killing Floor Font Problems
channel.description:
I noticed when I recently booted up Killing Floor that there is a problem with the font ingame, everything has become little dots and unreadable, unlike the normal text that is found usually.
Is there a way to remedy this? I don't know exactly how to solve it. When I change the resolution, it turns back, but some things still have dots on them.
Nevermind, I corrected it myself after looking at Tripwire Interactive's forum. Sorry.

item.title: Killing Floor Font Problems

I noticed when I recently booted up Killing Floor that there is a problem with the font ingame, everything has become little dots and unreadable, unlike the normal text that is found usually.
